root: ^Ahhh that's the stuff. The only thing that takes me back to my childhood like Beholderite does is a nice cold brew.
^Your mind seems so tainted by Beholderite. How can you still function?
^You learn some things when you're alive for hundreds of years.
^Hmmm. Ok well we might need some extra help, and not just with the lad that stole our compass. Whoever has that Beholderite probably has it guarded. Shall we ask someone in the tavern to assist us?
^Ah yes, let's take a look around... Oooo those two look promising. Who should we ask to join our party?

Brute: ^Good choice, Folkvar. Do you want to do the talking? I usually scare guys like him away.
Folkvar_talks_to_Brute: ^What do you want, preppy little man?
^We would like to hire your services
Brute_likes_beholderite: ^BEHOLDERITE?! I WILL DESTROY ANYONE WHO COMES BETWEEN ME AND BEHOLDERITE!!! WHERE IS IT?!
Brute_prostitute: ^You think I'm some kind of prostitute or something? That's stereotyping!
Resort_to_monk: ^Yeah, that other guy seemed a little crazy. Let's go talk to the bald one.
Iv_shows_power: ^What? What have you done to me? I'm suddenly so weak!
^While completely and utterly badass, let us not get overly thrilled. I will remind you that first, I must ask my father for permission to commence the bashing of skulls.
Netrixi_asks_Iv_why_here: ^I am a monk from the mountains to the East. I am looking for help in finding my brother. I believe he was taken as a slave to mine Beholderite.
^Oooo that's rough. Wait, I didn't think there were Beholderite mines anymore. I thought they were all outlawed.
^This man named Moke is running a secret operation. Still, it is very difficult to keep an operation that big a secret.
^I think I might be able to find your brother. I just developed a compass that is pointing to the source of that Beholderite. The problem is...
Iv_explains_past: ^I have trained my entire life to rid myself of worldly temptations. Beholderite simply does not phase me.
^Welcome aboard, then! Sadly, we can't start knocking skulls yet. Folkvar needs to ask daddy first.
Folkvar_talks_to_Iv: ^Well hello there, little lady! I hope you do not mind me saying but you look oddly out of place here!
^I am a monk from the mountains to the East. I am looking for help in finding my brother. I believe he was taken as a slave to mine Beholderite.
^By God! Excuse my language. Where do you think your brother was taken? By whom?
^I hear rumors of a man named Moke. His only goal is Beholderite and he is accumulating much. The problem is, I have no idea where Moke's lair may be.
Folkvar_offers_Iv_help: ^I think I know where your brother is. We are going to the same place.
